title: my in game keeps blinking black and I do not know what to do
body: At first started on the loading screen, where it will blink a messy mirror image, and most of it being black, as it happend in game as well, it never stopped, one of my teammates told me that my video card could be the problem but I have had it for 5 months, the one im using right now is MSI RX 470

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having some pretty serious driver or hardware problem failing to render the game.  My suggestion here would be to go over the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help troubleshoot and rule out possibilities.  Test it in a custom game and let me know how it goes.

Apparently the flickering stopped when I switched the game to borderless window from full screen... not sure if thats good or safe to stop the flickering. 

Is this normal ?

Nope, I wouldn't say it's normal.  I'm glad to hear that it served as a workaround, but it may just continue to degrade things over time.  You should still go over that guide to make sure everything's in order!
